name: Indoor Long Table: "Marks of Love"
description: A long, elegantly appointed table that can be found at the Curatorium of Secrets in Nasha Town.\nThere's no shortage of threats to a table's wellbeing: mischievous children, overexcited pets...\nHowever, with the right tablecloth and the appropriate color, pattern, and placement, any bumps and scratches suffered can be made to look as though they're part of the table's design.
